meanings.definition: A group of organic compounds with the formula C5H12O, consisting of five carbon atoms and a hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent1: I learned about pentanols in my chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of pentanols to understand their structure.
meanings.sent3: The pentanols threw a party in the beaker, inviting other molecules to join.
meanings.sent4: The pentanols stood out in the chemical reaction, like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to explain the concept of pentanols to the students.

meanings.definition: Any of the five isomeric alcohols derived from pentane.
meanings.sent1: My experiment involved testing different pentanols for their properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician carefully labeled each bottle of pentanols for safety.
meanings.sent3: The pentanols in the test tubes seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of pentanols filled the room, reminiscent of a floral bouquet.
meanings.sent5: The students conducted a hands-on experiment to distinguish between various pentanols.
